subject: Hello,dearest,
body:
Hello,dearest,
Gold for sale
My name is Nora Fernandez  I'm a pretty single 24 years old  girl
looking for love  and  seeking to sale Gold and Diamond weighing
2.98kg with JC ROYAL GOLD COMPANY Corporation in LIBERIA and to our
affiliated branches in Senegal and Ghana
Product specification as follows:
Raw Gold:
FOB
Origin: LIBERIA, Africa
FINENESS: 22Karats
Form: Gold Bars (AU Concentrate), Gold Dust And Gold BARS
PURITY: 97.95%
PRICE:  $ 38,000 USD per Kg
CIF
Mandate/Broker Commission: $2000 Per Kg
Our operational mining sites from different parts in Liberia provides
the large scale minerals production on a weekly basis, upto 40
kilograms of gold per week and up to 500 carats of rough diamonds of
different sizes per week also.
Upon your response we will send you our full cooperate offer (FCO)
which will state our terms and conditions for the transaction.
Thank you and we hope for your long term cooperation with our company.
Miss Nora Fernandez..

subject: Re:   Hello,dearest,
body:
Hello Miss Nora,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about the gold and diamond sales you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What is the current price per kilogram of gold and carat of rough diamonds?
2. Can you tell me more about JC ROYAL GOLD COMPANY? How long have they been in operation?
3. Are there any certifications or licenses that your company holds to ensure the authenticity and legality of the gold and diamonds?
4. Could you explain what FOB and CIF mean in terms of pricing and shipping?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Marian
